member.name: DXGI_MATRIX_3X2_F
member.summary: Represents a 3x2 matrix. Used with and to indicate the scaling and translation transform for SwapChainPanel swap chains.

member.name: DXGI_MATRIX_3X2_F._11
member.summary: The value in the first row and first column of the matrix.

member.name: DXGI_MATRIX_3X2_F._12
member.summary: The value in the first row and second column of the matrix.

member.name: DXGI_MATRIX_3X2_F._21
member.summary: The value in the second row and first column of the matrix.

member.name: DXGI_MATRIX_3X2_F._22
member.summary: The value in the second row and second column of the matrix.

member.name: DXGI_MATRIX_3X2_F._31
member.summary: The value in the third row and first column of the matrix.

member.name: DXGI_MATRIX_3X2_F._32
member.summary: The value in the third row and second column of the matrix.
